text: Reminder: Friendly reminder - <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Ideas/ct-p/ideas|submit your ideas to the idea forum> and post the link here with your idea. The votes for a feature help HubSpotters understand the demand. Thank you for all of your awesome ideas and feedback, we are listening and appreciate it.
It would be awesome if we could add custom classes or ID's to sections.
It’s very far from the only thing about the API documentation UI that needs fixing, but I’d really love to be able to link directly to specific API endpoints.
You _can_ add custom classes to sections that are added in a template via HubL
Even if it's in a drag and drop section created with page editor (not via HubL), you could create module that contains javascript to apply custom class to the parent section
That is basically what I have been doing but it would just be so simple if I could just add a "about-section" class to a section for styling.
